# 🧑‍🤝‍🧑 Loyal Helpful

As the Loyal, you cannot be recruited by roles such as Jackal or Cultist.

Cannot be assigned to Neutrals.

  • Max
    • Set the Maximum amount of Loyals that can be in a match
  • Spawn Chance
    • Set the percentage players have of getting Loyal
  • Impostors can become Loyal
    • ON: Impostors can become Loyal
    • OFF: Impostors cannot become Loyal
  • Crewmates can become Loyal
    • ON: Crewmates can become Loyal
    • OFF: Crewmates cannot become Loyal

From: TBD
